"Once upon a time when the Buddha was in the world.
King Prasenajit had a daughter.
Her name was Sunbeam.
She was intelligent and upright.
Her parents pitied her and held up her palace in high esteem.
The father said to the daughter.
"Because of my strength, you raised the palace in love and respect.
The woman answered her father.
"I have my own business.
It's not because of my father, the king.'

"Now, I will test you to see if you have the power of your own karma.

The king said to the woman.
"You have your own karma, and you don't need me.

"I have the power of karma.

"Do you have parents?

source_sentence: 我父母先此舍衛城中第一長者。
